Evert, the wiki idea is interesting.  How do you see that working?  Would=
 it be a place for the general public to post advice and information?  

I =
am talking to my group now about tutorial ideas and hopefully we will be ab=
le to provide something along those lines.  Of course there are a lot of pu=
blication pressures for us at the same time, but we do recognize how helpfu=
l it would be to users and we want to make using HyperNEAT easy.  I hope we=
 will be able to provide something along these lines in the near future.

k=
en  

--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel" <daniel_kuppitz@...> wrote:
>
>=
 Hello Evert,
> 
> great idea. A wiki won't cover all the things a HOL can =
cover, but I agree that it would be the best choice for any detailed parame=
ter explanation. My only concern is, that a wiki will also become very tech=
nical over time and consequently scare away most of the new interested user=
s (I always refer to people like me, who consider neural networks only as a=
 spare-time activity).
> 
> Cheers,
> Daniel
>
